<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Adding indicators data source in amp_metric table.</description>
        <name>Adding Indicator data source chioce list</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.info("Fix Script: Starting Adding Indicator data source chioce list");
checkAndAddFields('indicators','Indicators',getMaxSequence()+1);
function getMaxSequence(){
	gs.info("Fetching max sequence number for cmdb_ci_business_app table on architecture_type");
	var maxValue = 0;
	var max = new GlideAggregate('sys_choice');
	max.addQuery('name', 'apm_metric');
	max.addQuery('element', 'data_source');
	max.addAggregate('MAX', 'sequence');
	max.setGroup(false);
	max.query();
	if (max.next()) {
		maxValue = max.getAggregate('MAX', 'sequence');
	}
	gs.info("Max sequence number for apm_metric table on data_source is "+ maxValue);
	return parseInt(maxValue);
}
function checkAndAddFields(indicatorField,label,sequence){
	gs.info("Checking and adding "+label+ " if it doesnt exists");
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'apm_metric');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'data_source');
	gr.addQuery('value', indicatorField);
	
	gr.query();
	if(gr.getRowCount()==0){
		gr.initialize();
		gr.name = 'apm_metric';
		gr.element = 'data_source';
		gr.language = 'en';
		gr.label = label;
		gr.value = indicatorField;
		gr.sequence =  sequence;
		gr.insert();
		gs.info("Successfully inserted indicators data source");
	}else{
		gs.info("No updation of Indicator Field choices is required");
	}
}
gs.info("Fix Script: Adding Indicator data source chioce list");]]></script>
